div.p: Clinical modifier codes from the Human Phenotype Ontology. TODO: include corresponding codes from SNOMED CT.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/hp.owl where concept descends from HP:0012823 (Clinical modifier)
Include codes from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/hp.owl where concept descends from HP:0031797 (Clinical course)
